text.name: Return Fire
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Gain 1 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Return Fire
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count
[WhenUse] Gain <style="highlight">2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Headshot
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +10% damage for every 1 Speed difference (max 30%)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [Breath] and +1 [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Headshot
text.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +10% damage for every 1 Speed difference <style="highlight">(max 50%)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [Breath] and +<style="highlight">2 [Breath] Count
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Goin' for the Bullseye
text.desc:
[BeforeUse] If this unit has [Bullet_LogicAtelier], activate 'AL-HV Pulverisation Round' instead
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +10% damage for every 1 Speed difference (max 50%)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Breath]
[WhenUse] Consume all [LogicAtelierAM] on self, gain (value consumed x 2) [Breath] Potency, and deal +(value consumed x 12.5)% damage
coinDescs: [CriticalOnSucceedAttack] At more than 30 [Breath] Potency, consume up to 10 of [Breath] Potency over 30 to deal +([Breath] Potency consumed x 10)% damage

1071111.name: Precision Aim
1071111.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 10 [Breath] on self (max 2)

<style="highlight">Combat Start: if this unit is not set to use any Attack Skills (including E.G.O Skills), apply 3 [Breath] to 1 ally with the least Poise Potency</style>

Turn End: if this unit did not use any Attack Skills (including E.G.O Skills, excluding [CoveringFire]), gain 10 [Breath] and 1 [PenetrateResultUp] next turn

1071121.name: Spotter
1071121.desc:
1 ally with the least [Bullet] gains +2 [Breath] Count when using a Skill that consumes [Bullet].
- If the said ally is a Full-Stop Office Identity, or if they have less than 5 [Breath] Count, gain +4 [Breath] Count instead (once per turn; does not apply to units without [Bullet])

1071101.name: Snipe
1071101.desc:
Encounter Start: gain 3 [PenetrateResultUp]

Turn End: If this unit does not have any remaining [Bullet] of any kind, activate [Retreat_FullStop] (once per Encounter)

If this unit is Substituted in, or is rejoining battle after [Retreat_FullStop], gain max [LogicAtelierAM], 3 [PenetrateResultUp], and [FullReload] (except [Bullet_LogicAtelier]; once per Encounter)

1071102.name: Precision Aim
1071102.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 10 [Breath] on self (max 2)

Turn End: if this unit is not set to use any Attack Skills (including E.G.O Skills, excluding [CoveringFire]), gain 10 [Breath] and 1 [PenetrateResultUp] next turn.

1071103.name: Snipe
1071103.desc:
Encounter Start: gain 3 [PenetrateResultUp]

<style="highlight">When this unit enters the Encounter, gain 1 [Bullet_LogicAtelier] (once per Encounter)</style>

Turn End: If this unit does not have any remaining [Bullet] of any kind, activate [Retreat_FullStop] (once per Encounter)

If this unit is Substituted in, or is rejoining battle after [Retreat_FullStop], gain max [LogicAtelierAM], 3 [PenetrateResultUp], and [FullReload]
(Except [Bullet_LogicAtelier]; once per Encounter)
